modName: Nightingale Armour cape attached to hood - requested by Skot
summary: This mod removes the cape from the Nightingale chestpiece and re-attaches it to the Nightingale hood.
descriptionHtml:
This mod removes the cape from the Nightingale chestpiece and re-attaches it to the Nightingale hood. The cape will only appear when the Nightingale hood is equipped. The hood with cape can also be worn over other armours and clothes. All as requested by Skottorp.

!! The modification works for both the Male and Female armour.

ARTISTIC DISCLAIMER: The item contained within has been tailored to the desires of the requester, with components provided by or appointed by the requester. The appearance of this item does NOT mirror my artistic preference of style and artistic skills by default.
author: Sara

files.name: Cape to hood for Nightingale armour
